[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [Function: save_transactions_impl()] [Transaction info hash] Lines 223-229 store transaction info - is the transaction info hash validated against actual transaction content, or can mismatched hashes be restored? (Critical)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [System-wide] [Restore idempotency] If restore operations are called multiple times with the same data, is this safe and idempotent, or can duplicate writes cause data corruption? (High)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [Function: confirm_or_save_frozen_subtrees_impl()] [Position calculation accuracy] Can FrozenSubTreeIterator produce incorrect positions for certain num_leaves values that create valid-looking but wrong position-hash mappings? (High)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [System-wide] [Reconfiguration events] During restore of epoch change transactions, are reconfiguration events properly processed to update validator sets and consensus parameters? (Critical)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [Function: save_transactions()] [State snapshot invalidation] After restoring transactions, are existing state snapshots invalidated or updated, or can stale snapshots cause inconsistent state reads? (High)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [Function: save_transactions_impl()] [Gas refund validation] Are gas refunds in transaction info validated during restore, or can transactions with invalid gas accounting be restored? (Medium)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [System-wide] [Backup version compatibility] Are there version checks ensuring backed-up data format is compatible with current code, or can old/new format mismatches cause parsing errors? (High)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [Function: save_ledger_infos_impl()] [Duplicate ledger info] If the same ledger info appears multiple times in the array, does put_ledger_info() handle this correctly, or can duplicate keys cause database errors? (Low)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [System-wide] [Accumulator consistency] After full restore, is there validation that transaction accumulator root matches the root in latest ledger info, or can mismatches go undetected? (Critical)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [Function: save_transactions_impl()] [State migration] If state schema changes between backup and restore, is there migration logic, or can schema mismatches cause restore failures or data corruption? (High)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [Function: confirm_or_save_frozen_subtrees()] [Empty subtrees] What happens if frozen_subtrees is empty but num_leaves suggests there should be subtrees - does validation catch this inconsistency? (Medium)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [System-wide] [Network protocol version] During restore from backups created by nodes running different protocol versions, can version mismatches cause consensus incompatibility? (High)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [Function: save_transactions()] [Transaction ordering] Is there validation that transactions are provided in correct version order, or can out-of-order transactions be restored causing history corruption? (High)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [Function: save_transactions_impl()] [Event execution order] Are events validated to match their transaction's execution order, or can event ordering manipulation during restore cause smart contract bugs? (Medium)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [System-wide] [Checkpoint validation] For state checkpoint transactions, is there validation that the checkpoint state root is correct, or can invalid checkpoints be restored? (Critical)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [Function: update_latest_ledger_info()] [Quorum certificate validation] Does the function validate that LedgerInfoWithSignatures has valid quorum certificates with sufficient validator signatures, or can invalid QCs be set? (Critical)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [System-wide] [Block metadata validation] For block metadata transactions, is there validation that timestamp, proposer, and other metadata are consistent with consensus rules? (High)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [Function: save_transactions_impl()] [Write set key uniqueness] Within a single transaction's write set, are duplicate state keys detected and rejected, or can duplicate writes cause undefined behavior? (Medium)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [System-wide] [Restore progress tracking] If restore is interrupted mid-process, is there reliable progress tracking to resume safely, or can partial restore cause permanent corruption? (High)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [Function: save_transactions()] [Batch size coordination] Are ledger_db_batch and state_kv_batches kept synchronized in size/content, or can mismatched batches cause inconsistencies between state and transaction data? (High)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [Function: confirm_or_save_frozen_subtrees_impl()] [Hash algorithm consistency] Is there validation that frozen_subtrees use the same hash algorithm as the current system, or can algorithm mismatches cause verification failures? (Medium)

[File: storage/aptosdb/src/backup/restore_utils.rs] [System-wide] [Execution version validation] Are transaction execution versions validated during restore to ensure compatibility with current VM version, or can old execution data cause VM errors? (High)
